member.name: T:DustInTheWind.ClockNet.AnalogClock
member.summary: An Windows Forms control that displays an old style analog clock.

remarks.para: If the compilation symbol "PERFORMANCE_INFO" is used at compile time, additional information about the time consumed with the method are displayed in the upper left corner of the control.
If the "PERFORMANCE_INFO" symbol is not used, the code necessary to colect performance information will not be compiled at all, so it will not influence the performance.

member.name: T:DustInTheWind.ClockNet.Shapes.IAngularShape
member.summary: Represents a Shape that is drawn repeatedly at different angles on the clock. The angles are measured from the 12 o'clock hour. The clock decides the angle and then asks the Shape to draw itself. The first shape is drawn in the first position after the 12 o'clock hour. The 12 o'clock hour position is drawn last.

member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the current instance and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.para: Dispose(bool disposing) executes in two distinct scenarios.
If the method has been called directly or indirectly by a user's code managed and unmanaged resources can be disposed.
If the method has been called by the runtime from inside the finalizer you should not reference other objects. Only unmanaged resources can be disposed.

member.param: Specifies if the method has been called by a user's code (true) or by the runtime from inside the finalizer (false).

member.name: T:DustInTheWind.ClockNet.Templates.BlackClockTemplate
member.summary: Provides a predefined clock template with a black-themed design, including default background, angular, and hand shapes.
member.remarks: Use this class to create a clock template with a standard set of shapes and styles suitable for a black or dark-themed clock face. The template initializes the BackgroundShapes, AngularShapes, and HandShapes properties with default values representing a complete analog clock layout.

member.name: M:DustInTheWind.ClockNet.Templates.BlackClockTemplate.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with default background, angular, and hand shapes.
member.remarks: This constructor populates the BackgroundShapes, AngularShapes, and HandShapes properties with their respective default values. Use this constructor to create a clock template with the standard set of shapes.

member.name: T:DustInTheWind.ClockNet.Templates.BlueClockTemplate
member.summary: Provides a predefined clock template with a blue-themed design, including default background, angular, and hand shapes.
member.remarks: Use this class to create a clock face with a standard set of shapes and colors suitable for blue-themed or modern clock displays. The template initializes its shape collections with default values representing a typical analog clock layout.

member.name: M:DustInTheWind.ClockNet.Templates.BlueClockTemplate.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with default background, angular, and hand shapes.
member.remarks: This constructor populates the BackgroundShapes, AngularShapes, and HandShapes properties with their respective default values. Use this constructor to create a clock template with the standard set of shapes.

member.name: T:DustInTheWind.ClockNet.Templates.DefaultClockTemplate
member.summary: Provides the default visual template for rendering a clock, including standard background, tick marks, and hand shapes.
member.remarks: This template supplies a conventional analog clock appearance with predefined shapes for the dial, tick marks, and hands. It can be used as a base or reference for custom clock templates. The default configuration includes hour, minute, and second hands, as well as standard tick marks and background elements.

member.name: T:DustInTheWind.ClockNet.Templates.FancyClockTemplate
member.summary: Provides a fancy visual template for rendering a clock, featuring nib-style hands and a decorative sweep hand.
member.remarks: This template supplies an elegant analog clock appearance with nib-style hour and minute hands, a fancy sweep hand for seconds, and standard tick marks and background elements.

member.name: M:DustInTheWind.ClockNet.Templates.FancyClockTemplate.#ctor

member.name: T:DustInTheWind.ClockNet.Templates.WhiteFancyClockTemplate
member.summary: Provides a white fancy visual template for rendering a clock, featuring a slot-style hour hand and elegant design.
member.remarks: This template supplies a distinctive analog clock appearance with a slot-carved hour hand, line-style minute and second hands, and standard tick marks on a black dial background.

member.name: M:DustInTheWind.ClockNet.Templates.WhiteFancyClockTemplate.#ctor

member.summary: Releases all resources used by the current instance.

member.name: M:DustInTheWind.ClockNet.TimeProviders.TimeProviderBase.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the current instance and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.para: Dispose(bool disposing) executes in two distinct scenarios.
If the method has been called directly or indirectly by a user's code managed and unmanaged resources can be disposed.
If the method has been called by the runtime from inside the finalizer you should not reference other objects. Only unmanaged resources can be disposed.

member.param: Specifies if the method has been called by a user's code (true) or by the runtime from inside the finalizer (false).
